description: '''''Los Colorados''''' (from the Spanish "The [[colorado potato beetle]]s"; also known as ''The Colorados'') is a Ukrainian band formed in 2006 in [[Ternopil]]. The band plays their own songs, but have also covered several popular and folk songs. Los Colorados increased in prominence after their cover of [[Katy Perry]]'s song "[[Hot n Cold]]" grew popular via online video websites. The band plays guitar, [[bayan (accordion)|bayan]], bass, and drums.
